Class PortletUrlRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts2.components.PortletUrlRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UrlRenderer

    public class PortletUrlRenderer
extends Object
implements UrlRenderer
    Implementation of the UrlRenderer interface that renders URLs for portlet environments.
